#summary Ada EL Installation

= Build =

Build with the following commands:

{{{
   ./configure
   make
}}}

The samples can be built using:
{{{
   gnatmake -Psamples
}}}

= Tests =

The unit tests are implemented using [http://libre.adacore.com/libre/tools/aunit/ AUnit].
The unit tests are built using:
{{{
   gnatmake -Ptests
}}}

And unit tests are executed with:

{{{
   bin/el_harness
}}}
